DOC.brief_summary: Total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) inhalation anesthesia widely safely use , many clinical trial compare various aspect anesthesia . However , study compare quality recovery different method general anesthesia vitrectomy . In study , investigator compare functional recovery general anesthesia TIVA inhalation anesthesia QoR-40 questionnaire vitrectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Propofol-remifentanil Total Intravenous Anesthesia Desflurane-remifentanil Balanced Anesthesia With Regard Post-anesthetic Functional Recovery Measured With QoR-40 Vitrectomy
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients ( 2080 year old ) schedule vitrectomy surgery undergo general anesthesia . 2 . ASA 13 1 . Patients allergy anesthetic agent 2 . Anticipated difficult airway 3 . BMI > 30 kg/m2 4 . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease 5 . Heart failure 6 . Unstable angina
